description: Barrow ease their relegation fears with a League Two victory over fellow strugglers Accrington.
title: Barrow 2-0 Accrington Stanley
maintext:
This will be just the fourth Football League fixture between Barrow and Accrington Stanley, with the Bluebirds winless across those matches (D2 L1).
No side has scored more than once in any of the three Football League meetings between Barrow and Accrington Stanley – two 1-1 draws last season, before Stanley won this season’s reverse fixture 1-0.
After losing their last outing at Holker Street 1-0 against Carlisle United, Barrow will be looking to avoid losing successive home league games for the first time this season.
